title: NBA Play-In/Playoff Special, Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: NBA Play-In/Playoff Special, Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
72 regular season games done. The NBA playoffs have finally arrived. Matt and Stak breakdown the play-in matchups, including Steph vs. Lebron. Plus, they talk about the first round matchups already set and answer fan questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
